problem.markdown:
1. THE PROCESS IN WHICH, REMOVAL OF MATERIAL IN THE FORM OF CHIP FROM THE WORKPIECE IS CALLED (x) Machining Process ( ) Welding Process ( ) Forming Process ( ) Joining Process
2. TO ACHIEVE A DESIRE GEOMETRY SHAPE OF THE WORKPIECE, THE MACHINE TOOL HAS ( ) To control the workpiece-cutting tool positional relationship ( ) To provide relative motion between tool and workpiece ( ) To provide appropriate cutting speed and feed (x) All of the above
3. DATA PROCESSING UNIT (DPU) IS A PART OF (x) Machine Control unit ( ) Control Loop unit ( ) Process Function Unit ( ) Digital print unit
4. IN CASE OF POINT TO POINT (PTP) MOTION IN NC MACHINE TOOL (x) The motion is stopped and the task is performed ( ) The motion remain continue and the task is performed ( ) The motion does not stopped and the task is not performed ( ) The motion is stopped and task is not performed
5. WOOD CNC ROUTER ARE DIFFERENT THAN CNC METAL CUTTING MACHINES BY ( ) The CNC wood router typically spins faster ( ) The CNC wood router is a low end hobby grade machines typically uses smaller tool ( ) The CNc wood router is preferred for non metal (x) All of the above
problem.p: 1. THE PROCESS IN WHICH, REMOVAL OF MATERIAL IN THE FORM OF CHIP FROM THE WORKPIECE IS CALLED

choicegroup.choice: Machining Process
Welding Process
Forming Process
Joining Process

problem.p: 2. TO ACHIEVE A DESIRE GEOMETRY SHAPE OF THE WORKPIECE, THE MACHINE TOOL HAS

choicegroup.choice: To control the workpiece-cutting tool positional relationship
To provide relative motion between tool and workpiece
To provide appropriate cutting speed and feed
All of the above

problem.p: 3. DATA PROCESSING UNIT (DPU) IS A PART OF

choicegroup.choice: Machine Control unit
Control Loop unit
Process Function Unit
Digital print unit

problem.p: 4. IN CASE OF POINT TO POINT (PTP) MOTION IN NC MACHINE TOOL

choicegroup.choice: The motion is stopped and the task is performed
The motion remain continue and the task is performed
The motion does not stopped and the task is not performed
The motion is stopped and task is not performed

problem.p: 5. WOOD CNC ROUTER ARE DIFFERENT THAN CNC METAL CUTTING MACHINES BY

choicegroup.choice: The CNC wood router typically spins faster
The CNC wood router is a low end hobby grade machines typically uses smaller tool
The CNc wood router is preferred for non metal
All of the above
